scriptmanager.scripts.Coordinate_Manipulation.BED_Manipulation

Class SortBED

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.scripts.Coordinate_Manipulation.BED_Manipulation.SortBED

  • public class SortBED
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains scripts for sorting coordinate intervals (BED/GFF) by the tag counts of a CDT matrix file.
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    SortBEDCLI, SortBEDWindow

    • Method Detail

      • sortBEDbyCDT

        public static void sortBEDbyCDT(java.lang.String outbase,
                                java.io.File bed,
                                java.io.File cdt,
                                int START_INDEX,
                                int STOP_INDEX,
                                boolean gzOutput)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Sort a BED file by the values from a CDT matrix file. Includes Gzip support.
        Parameters:
        outbase - Filepath basename (without ext) to save the sorted BED (<basename>.bed) and sorted CDT (<basename>.cdt) files.
        bed - input BED file to sort
        cdt - input CDT file with values to sort by
        START_INDEX - the start column to consider when summing values to sort
        STOP_INDEX -
        gzOutput - if true, the output files will be gzipped.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
